definition: to walk (side part of split character)
to step out/to take a (first) step
to step in/to stride forward/to forge ahead
to stride toward (success)/to march toward/to take a step toward
Chiang Mai, second city of Thailand
Mahdi or Mehdi (Arabic: Guided one), redeemer of some Islamic prophesy
Chen Chi-mai (1964-), Taiwanese DPP politician, vice premier of the Republic of China (2019-)

sentences.english: US Highway 2 from Ray to Minot.
Now paved and smooth as glass on over to Stumpy Meadows Reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 现在，顺利铺平玻璃上交给矮墩墩迈德斯水库。

sentences.english: We have made a step towards success.
sentences.chinese: 我们已向成功迈进一步。

sentences.english: Wendy and Michael get acquainted in Michael's new office.
sentences.chinese: 温蒂和迈可在迈可的新办公室互相认识。

sentences.english: Wendy and Michael get acquainted in Michael's new office.
sentences.chinese: 温蒂和迈可在迈可的新办公室互相认识。

sentences.english: Another said that Zalmai was protected by a foreign security company.
sentences.chinese: 另有人称宰里迈被一家外国保安公司保护。

sentences.english: Mysore sandalwood oil was renowned and considered superior to all other varieties.
sentences.chinese: 迈索尔檀香油是著名的，并认为优于其他所有品种。

sentences.english: Harmonious balsamic notes proper of Upper Maipo Valley.
sentences.chinese: 上迈扑山谷地区固有的和谐醇香。

sentences.english: GILDEMEISTER as a manufacturer of cutting machine tools, holds a leading position worldwide as a full-liner.
sentences.chinese: 吉特迈集团是全球领先的切削机床制造商。

sentences.english: The Scottish government engaged Libya and the United Kingdom on the matter of releasing al-Megrahi.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰政府也参与了利比亚和英国释放迈格拉希事件。

sentences.english: The demon took another stride forward, carrying with it a smell of rotting fish.
sentences.chinese: 魔鬼又往前迈了一步，带着一股腐烂的鱼的味道。

sentences.english: Wendy continues to introduce Michael to the accounting personnel in their accounting division.
sentences.chinese: 温蒂继续向迈可介绍会计课的同仁。

sentences.english: Midas looked at his child. He saw what he had done.
sentences.chinese: 迈德斯看着自己的孩子，他发现了他所干的事。

sentences.english: If we're looking at a similar mortality rate, that's the end of the Minoans.
sentences.chinese: 如果是同样的死亡率，那就是迈诺安人的末日。

sentences.english: President Barack Obama called last week for Megrahi to be put under house arrest.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马总统上个星期呼吁把迈格拉希软禁在家。

sentences.english: Transition to a lunge like pose on the step back.
sentences.chinese: 转换到这个体式，像是单腿后迈的体式一样。
